at the beginning of each end step if you drew two or more cards this turn you may put a quest counter on cardname
at the beginning of each opponent's end step if you didn't lose life this turn you may put a quest counter on cardname damage causes loss of life
at the beginning of each end step discard your hand
at the beginning of each end step if an opponent lost n or more life this turn you may put a quest counter on cardname damage causes loss of life
